column1: Personal Secretary To Chief Executive Officer
column2: Job Description : We are looking for a skilled and reliable Personal Secretary to offer administrative support and assistance to our Founder cum CEO. The Personal Secretary will oversee the executives' daily operations and ensure smooth organisational communication and coordination. Role & responsibilities Organise and prioritise the CEO's schedules, appointments, and meetings.     Compile and structure documents, reports, and presentations for various meetings and presentations.     Arrange travel logistics, such as flight bookings, hotel accommodations, and transportation.     Respond to all incoming and outgoing communications, emails, and phone calls on behalf of the CEO.     Maintain secrecy and prudence when handling sensitive information and conversations.     Serve as a point of contact between the CEO and internal and external stakeholders, including clients, partners, and other staff members.     Conduct research and gather necessary information to support the CEO in decision-making and project management.     Assist in organising events, conferences, and other corporate functions.     General administrative chores include filing, photocopying, and record-keeping.     Provide additional support and assistance to the CEO as required.

column2: This position is right for you if you have high energy, plenty of motivation, excellent communication skills, and superb attention to detail. This is a fantastic opportunity for anyone who thrives in a fast-paced, dynamic environment, enjoys learning and wants to be the right hand of leaders and support them in everything it takes to scale the organization in high growth.         ?       What will you do?         Work closely with Senior Executives and handle various professional daily tasks and responsibilities         Act as the point of contact among executives, employees and other external partners and clients         Play a significant role in ensuring smooth day-to-day flow:          Ensure that the executives are where they need to be, when they need to be there         Manage complex calendars for the executives, and for other team members on occasion         Make sure the executive follows these itineraries in a timely manner         Handle internal & external meeting requests, schedule meetings and conference calls across multiple time zones. Set and test everything out in advance to ensure a seamless experience         Resolve scheduling conflicts while adhering to the organization s priorities and goals       Coordinate team meetings and events, both internally and off-site       Handle correspondence and emails fluently in English         Handle international and domestic travel arrangements, including flight itineraries, hotel reservations, car services.         Handle personal and professional matters with the highest level of confidentiality and time sensitivity          What skills and qualifications do you need?          Proven experience (3+ years) as an executive assistant, preferably in a global companies.         Exceptional verbal and written communication skills, fluent in English         Excellent organization and time management skills ability to plan, prioritize, and multi-task when managing with a heavy workload         Strong attention to details and ability to follow-through with a high level of accuracy         High and flexible availability this team will be supporting execs across multiple locations and timezones and so flexibility to work late, and early shifts is a must         High energy and dynamic agile and able to adjust to changing priorities         Independent with a proactive approach: Getting things done & can-do attitude         Exceptional interpersonal skills, positive attitude, team-player         Passion for excellent service, learning new skills/concepts, communicating across divisions, project management         Warm and friendly, yet strong and assertive         Curious and resourceful problem solver ability to think ahead, think outside the box or being creative within it.         High level of discretion in handling confidential information         Proficiency with Google-suite (Gmail, Google calendar, Drive), MS office

column2: A minimum of 5 years as an EA at the executive level, preferably within a professional services environment      Good organizational skills and basic commercial business intelligence are essential      Previous search firm and/or office administration are a plus      The ideal candidate will be a role model for members of the administrative staff and have a track record that displays collaboration expertise and a working style that ensures that mutual interests of all parties are met      He or she is the trusted and respected right arm to the executive      Project management experience is a plus              Responsibilities:          Supporting the Assignment Process          Arranging client (CXOs) and candidate meetings      Interaction with clients / candidates / overseas offices      Travel arrangement (international and domestic)      Helping ensure the necessary documentation/ paperwork is in order (Visas, letter of invitation, etc.)      Hotel reservations      Arranging local transportation      Interacting with other EZ offices globally for support as required      Drafting and sending off internal communication / memos etc. as required by the Consultant he/ she is working with.          Database Management          Adhering to protocols and processes related to EZ proprietary database.      Update the database with accurate and timely information.      Generating high quality documents from the system      Strong process discipline - must know how to use the system and use it in conformance with minimum standards.          Documentation          Preparing client ready documents (assignment related and or lead related)      Adept in Word, PowerPoint and Excel. Deliver to pre-determined deadlines.          Administrative          Arranges all scheduling, including but not limited to candidate meetings and interviews, client meetings and interviews, business development meetings, assignment related meetings, internal meetings, video conferencing.      Manages a complex calendar and prioritize meetings/calls as needed.      Arranges and coordinates complex and detailed travel plans, itineraries, and agendas for both the Consultant and Candidate. Compiles documents for travel-related meetings.      Processes expense reimbursements for Consultants and Candidates      Communicates directly, and on behalf of the Consultant, on Client, Candidate, and internal matters. Provides a bridge for smooth communication between the Consultant and external/internal teams.      Composes, prepares, and edits correspondence that is often confidential.      Performs additional administrative support activities including but not limited to, fielding telephone calls, receiving and directing visitors, event planning, and other ad-hoc projects as requested.      Holds additional Office/Reception responsibilities to ensure the office is operating smoothly.      Provides ad-hoc support to other EAs when requested to assist with work overflow as capacity allows. (Determined by Office Administrator)          Project Management/Search Related          Serves as client and candidate liaison assisting consultant in maintenance of daily search activities.      Provides ongoing project management assistance in complex and confidential assignments      Works closely and effectively with Consultant and Research to ensure deadlines are met and client and candidate needs are served.      Ensures that our global database is up-to-date and accurate; including but not limited to all client/internal documents, client/candidate information, notes, emails, and appointments.      Produces high quality Client and Candidate deliverables with a hands-on approach ensuring completion within the designated timeline.      Prioritizes conflicting needs; handles matters expeditiously, proactively, and follows- through on projects to successful completion, often with deadline pressure.      Takes a proactive approach during the Consultant s absence to minimize effect to the client.      Assists accounting department with invoicing to clients.      Builds positive relationships and interfaces with high-level executive candidates (Fortune 500 client executives & candidates) involved in highly confidential projects.

column2: Purpose The purpose of this position is to provide efficient and effective executive, project, and administrative support. Role Accountabilities Models and fosters collaborative and personal leadership within the Organization community. Supports the beliefs, ethos and Benedictine values of the organization Models professional behavior with integrity and compassion. Models effective interpersonal communication skills including the skills of effective listening, conflict resolution, negotiation, mediation and assertiveness and constructive confrontation. Carries out duties after consultation with the Organization Leadership Team. Seeks professional development opportunities to be competent and confident in the role. Fosters recognition and respect for the individuality of each person in the Organization community. Participates as a member of the Organization Team in Organization functions. Undertakes other duties as specified and delegated by the Head Plans and monitors the daily operations of the Organization Maintains calendar of appointments. Taking Minutes of the meeting Receives and screens phone calls, emails, faxes and mail. Receives inquiries, concerns complaints and actions or forwards along appropriate channels. Drafts and distributes correspondence. Maintains records and files, ensuring accuracy and security. Database entry, updating, and retrieval. Research, review, and collation of information. Prepares agendas, reports and presentations for meetings. Take Minutes of Meeting Attends and take minutes of Staff Briefings, Staff Meetings, HODs Meetings, and other meetings as well. Coordinates the updating of the Staff Phone List, Critical Incident List, Data Breach Log, Organization Layout map, and Job Descriptions. Coordinates advertising for prospective staff and liaises with prospective staff regarding applications and interviews. Coordinates ordering and management of promotional item stock levels. Coordinates certificates, gifts and cards as required. Coordinates staff travel arrangements. Coordinates marketing with appropriate staff and external bodies. Coordinates special events, functions and meetings (invites, RSVPs, catering, equipment, staffing). Maintains the Organizational documental archives. Maintains the Organizational  policies, manuals and forms. Maintains Board Room bookings and ensure that those departments using the Board Room are responsible for the good order and cleanliness of the facility and resources. administration duties Ensures good stewardship of resources. Supports staff members with technical assistance. Liaises with clients, service providers Other office management and project management ad hoc duties to ensure good order in the Organization.   Communication Communicates effectively with staff and students regarding any day to day events and concerns. Works collaboratively with other members of the Organizational community. Liaises with the Leadership Team on issues or concerns within areas of specific responsibility. Liaises with the Organizational Board to ensure effective operation. Liaises with other Good Samaritan bodies to ensure a cohesive relationship. Liaises with external organizations to ensure support required for efficient and effective operation. Liaises with multimedia staff regarding updates to website, SharePoint and the Portal. Ensures confidentiality as appropriate. Skills Attention to detail. Ability to organize, multitask and prioritize. Has communication and relationship networking skills. Is professional, proactive and resourceful. Essential Criteria for the role: A visionary, creative and innovative leader. A minimum of 5 years experience as an Executive Assistant. Ability to demonstrate excellent communication skills. Able to empathize with and manage the complex demands of the Organizational environment. An efficient administrator, able to work well under the pressure of deadlines and budget parameters. Able to work with colleagues to create a positive and collaborative working environment. A person who actively participates in professional learning and shares their learning with staff. A person who maintains confidentiality in discussions with staff. A positive role model for staff in terms of dress standards and professional manner in all interactions with members of the organization community.

column2: The Executive Assistant to the Founder and CTO will be crucial in enhancing the effectiveness of our executive leadership by providing superior administrative support and acting as a liaison among senior management, employees, and external partners. The role demands a proactive, communicative, and highly organized professional who can manage multiple tasks efficiently in a fast-paced environment.  Role & responsibilities   Serve as the primary point of contact for internal and external constituencies on all matters pertaining to the Office of the Founder and CTO. Organize and coordinate executive outreach and external relations efforts. Manage communication between department heads and the executive office, ensuring all projects are moving forward in a timely manner. Facilitate smooth communication between the Founder and external parties, including clients, vendors, and other stakeholders. Plan, coordinate, and ensure the Founder's schedule is followed and respected. Provide a bridge for smooth communication between the Founder and staff, contributing to a better understanding and resolution of office dynamics. Assist in managing an active calendar of appointments; compose and prepare confidential correspondence; arrange complex and detailed agendas. Key Result Areas (KRAs): Communication Efficiency:  Maintain 100% timely communication across all levels of the organization and with external parties. Project Oversight:  Ensure that no less than 95% of projects involving the Founder are completed on time by facilitating effective inter-departmental communication. Administrative Excellence:  Achieve a 30% reduction in administrative delays involving the Founders engagements. Work Environment:  Foster a positive and productive work environment in the absence of the Founder by implementing efficient office management practices. Expectations: Proficient in English, both written and spoken. Able to maintain professionalism and a calm demeanor in high-stress situations. Ability to handle confidential information with discretion. Should create a supportive and inclusive atmosphere in the office, especially during the absence of the Founder, ensuring smooth operations and staff well-being. Preferred candidate profile   Proven experience as an Executive Assistant or similar administrative support role in a high-paced environment. Strong organizational skills with the ability to multi-task and manage time effectively. Familiarity with MS Office, project management software, and other tech-savvy tools necessary for communication.

column2: Executive Assistant to the CEO  Summary: Executive Assistant to the CEO & Project Coordinator  This position will be exposed to an extremely wide range of responsibilities, including, preparing presentations, participating in external and internal meetings, subsequently preparing notes and action items, following up with responsible parties on action items, and office and personal administrative support.  Essential Duties and Responsibilities include the following.   Coordinating projects for BioGenex's CEO, some of which will require an understanding of the companies products, technologies, and strategic partnerships. Managing the CEOs workflow and priorities by managing his schedule, email, filing systems and anticipates next steps and issues. Conserves CEO's time by reading, researching, and routing correspondence; drafting letters and documents; collecting and analyzing information; initiating telecommunications. Maintains CEO's appointment schedule by planning and scheduling meetings, conferences, teleconferences, and domestic and international travel. Welcomes guests and customers by greeting them, in person or on the telephone; answering or directing inquiries. Maintains customer confidence and protects operations by keeping information confidential. Proactively identifies ways to improve efficiency and efficacy in the leadership team operations and office systems. Supports the CEO by performing personal tasks such as meeting contractors at United States residence, managing purchases and deliveries, making payments on behalf of the CEO.  Assists CEO with projects as needed. Competencies: To perform the job successfully, an individual should demonstrate the following competencies: Vision and Attention to Detail Pays close attention to details. Is extremely organized and is also able to see the larger systems and strategic priorities to provide support on both a macro and micro level. Communication Has extensive writing experience. Writes persuasively, clearly and informatively; edits work for spelling and grammar; varies writing style to meet needs; presents numerical data effectively; able to read and interpret written information. Speaks clearly and persuasively in positive or negative situations; listens and gets clarification; responds well to questions; participates in meetings. Problem Solving - Identifies and resolves problems in a timely manner; gathers and analyzes information skillfully; develops alternative solutions; works well in group problem solving situations; uses reason even when dealing with emotional topics. Technical Skills - Assesses own strengths and weaknesses; pursues training and development opportunities; strives to continuously build knowledge and skills; shares expertise with others. Interpersonal Skills - Focuses on solving conflict, not blaming; maintains confidentiality; listens to others without interrupting; keeps emotions under control; remains open to others' ideas. Requirements: Education and/or Experience: Bachelors degree required, preferably a Bachelors of Science degree. 5-10 years of experience working as a project coordinator or assistant highly preferred. Language Skills: Must possess the ability to absorb, analyze, and clearly articulate technical information, government regulations, and business strategies. Must possess the ability to write reports, business correspondence, and procedure manuals. Must possess the ability to effectively present information and respond to questions from groups of managers, clients, customers, and the general public. Computer Skills: To perform this job successfully, an individual should have knowledge of All Microsoft Office Programs, O365, including but not limited to Word, Excel, Outlook, Adobe Acrobat, Publisher, and Power Point. Fluency in Project Management software preferred.

column2: We are currently Hiring for one of our Esteemed MNC Clients for the above position. Selected candidates will work as a Full Time employee of our Client. Job Title:  JIRA Implementation Expert Location:  Gurgaon/Noida/ Hyderabad/Indore. Employment Type:  Full Time, Permanent Notice Period:  30 Days (Immediate Joiner) Qualification:  Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science Experience : 8 -14 yrs. Position Type:  Fulltime Roles & Responsibilities 'We are seeking a highly skilled and experienced JIRA Implementation Expert to join our team. As a JIRA Implementation Expert, you will be responsible for leading the implementation and configuration of JIRA across our organization. You will work closely with various teams to understand their requirements, design and implement JIRA workflows, and provide guidance on best practices for using JIRA to optimize project management and collaboration. JIRA Implementation: Lead the implementation and configuration of JIRA across the departments, ensuring alignment with business needs and objectives. Hands on experience in Groovy scripting. Requirements Gathering:   Collaborate with stakeholders to gather and analyze requirements for JIRA implementation. Understand their workflows, processes, and pain points to design effective JIRA solutions. Workflow Design and Configuration:   Design and configure JIRA workflows, issue types, fields, screens, and permission schemes to meet the specific needs of different teams and projects. Ensure workflows align with Industry best practices and support efficient project management. Customization and Integration:  Customize JIRA to enhance functionality and integrate with other tools and systems, if needed. Training and Adoption:  Provide training and support to users on JIRA functionality, best practices, and usage guidelines. Process Improvement:  Identify opportunities for process improvement and automation using JIRA. Collaborate with teams to streamline workflows, automate repetitive tasks, and improve overall efficiency. Reporting and Analytics:  Develop and maintain reports and dashboards in JIRA to provide insights into project status, team performance, and key metrics. Well versed with different JIRA plug-ins and core JIRA functions, plus able to implement the same. Any new plug-in should be able to learn fast and implement. Requirements: Proven experience as a JIRA Implementation Expert or JIRA Consultant, with a strong understanding of JIRA implementation, configuration, and customization. In-depth knowledge of JIRA workflows, issue types, fields, screens, and permission schemes. Experience in designing and configuring complex workflows. Experience in integrating JIRA with other tools and systems, such as Confluence, Bit bucket, and third-party applications. Strong problem-solving and analytical skills, with the ability to understand complex workflows and translate them into efficient JIRA configurations. Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams and stakeholders. Strong project management skills, with the ability to lead and drive JIRA implementation projects from initiation to completion. Experience in training and supporting users on JIRA functionality and best practices. Atlassian certifications, such as JIRA Administrator Certification or JIRA Project Administrator Certification, are highly desirable. Knowledge of Agile methodologies, such as Scrum and Kanban, and their implementation in JIRA is a plus. Desired Skills : 'If you are a JIRA Implementation Expert with a passion for optimizing project management processes, driving collaboration, and delivering successful JIRA implementations, we would love to hear from you. Education & Certifications: BE/ BTech / BSC / MCA

column2: Job DescriptionJob Description Key Responsibilities : CMDB Configuration and Maintenance : Configure and maintain CMDB classes, attributes, relationships, and data sources within the ServiceNow platform to accurately represent IT assets, configuration items (CIs), and their dependencies. Data Population and Synchronization : Manage data population and synchronization processes, including ServiceNow Discovery, SCCM integration, manual data imports, and reconciliation, to ensure CMDB records are up-to-date and accurate. Data Quality and Governance : Implement data quality and governance policies, standards, and procedures for CMDB management, including data normalization, deduplication, access control, and audit compliance, aligned with ITIL best practices. Integration with ITSM Processes : Integrate CMDB with other IT service management (ITSM) modules, such as incident, problem, change, and asset management, to enable impact analysis, change planning, and service dependency mapping. CMDB Health and Performance Monitoring : Monitor CMDB health metrics, performance indicators, and data integrity checks, and perform regular audits, data cleanup, and optimization activities to maintain data quality and reliability. User Training and Support : Provide training and support to end-users on CMDB usage, best practices, and troubleshooting, and serve as a subject matter expert on CMDB-related inquiries and issues. Reporting and Analytics : Develop reports, dashboards, and analytics to provide insights into CMDB data, trends, and compliance metrics, enabling informed decision-making and IT service improvement initiatives. Documentation and Knowledge Sharing : Document CMDB configurations, processes, and procedures, and contribute to knowledge sharing sessions and documentation updates to promote understanding and adoption of CMDB practices. Platform Upgrades and Maintenance : Coordinate platform upgrades, patches, and maintenance activities with the ServiceNow platform team, and ensure CMDB configurations and customizations are compatible with new releases and updates. Qualifications : Bachelor's degree in computer science, information technology, or a related field. ServiceNow Certified System Administrator (CSA) certification is required. Additional ServiceNow certifications, such as Certified Implementation Specialist (CIS) or Certified Application Developer (CAD), are a plus. Minimum of 2 years of experience as a ServiceNow administrator, with a focus on CMDB configuration, administration, and data management. Proficiency in ServiceNow administration tasks, including user management, role-based access control (RBAC), workflow configuration, and platform configuration. Strong understanding of CMDB concepts, ITIL principles, and best practices for configuration management, change management, and service asset and configuration management (SACM). Experience with ServiceNow Discovery, Service Mapping, and Event Management modules for automated data population and dependency mapping is preferred. Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to troubleshoot CMDB-related issues and recommend effective solutions. Strong communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams and stakeholders at all levels. Preferred Skills : Knowledge of IT infrastructure components, technologies, and standards, including networks, servers, databases, cloud services, and virtualization. Familiarity with data center operations, configuration management tools, and IT asset management (ITAM) practices. Understanding of IT security principles and practices, particularly related to CMDB access control, data encryption, and compliance requirements. Experience with CMDB data federation and integration with external data sources, third-party systems, and cloud platforms using REST APIs, web services, and middleware. Project management skills and experience coordinating CMDB-related projects and initiatives, including planning, execution, and stakeholder management.

column2: Job Description: As a liaison officer, you will serve as the primary point of contact and communication link between different stakeholders, departments, or organizations. Your role will involve facilitating effective communication, fostering collaboration, and ensuring smooth coordination to achieve common goals and objectives.    Responsibilities: Facilitate Communication:  Act as a central point of contact for all communication between different parties involved, ensuring messages are conveyed accurately and in a timely manner. Coordinate Activities:  Coordinate activities, meetings, and initiatives involving multiple stakeholders, ensuring alignment with objectives and deadlines. Build Relationships:  Cultivate and maintain positive relationships with internal and external stakeholders, fostering trust and cooperation. Resolve Issues:  Identify and address any issues, conflicts, or misunderstandings that may arise between parties, working towards mutually acceptable solutions. Provide Support:  Offer support and guidance to stakeholders as needed, serving as a resource for information and assistance. Monitor Progress:  Monitor the progress of projects or initiatives, keeping all parties informed of developments and milestones. Report and Documentation:  Prepare reports, documentation, and other materials as necessary to keep stakeholders informed and ensure accountability. column2: #Job Description: Executive Assistant to Directors (No 2) - Mumbai #Job Summary We are seeking an experienced and highly capable Executive Assistant to support two of our esteemed Directors in our Mumbai office. column2: Job Summary: The PMO Specialist is responsible for managing and overseeing CEO office initiatives/projects planning, coordination, ensuring proper tracking and reporting on progress along with governance and execution. The role involves collaboration and periodic follow ups with various teams, including Consultants, Sales, HR, delivery heads, quality, sales, pre-sales, business heads, recruitment, operations, facilities, and other team to ensure smooth execution. The PMO Specialist is expected to have a strong background in project management, and having knowledge of financials understanding will be added advantage. This role will also be required to manage CEO time schedule, calendar invites, daily reports, and arrangement of meetings with team or clients.   Key Responsibilities: Strategic Planning: Driving and implementation of strategic initiatives/projects and objectives in alignment with the organization's overall objectives. Collaborate with executive leadership to establish project priorities and ensure alignment with the company's strategic vision. Support in CEO presentation for business plans or board or any other presentations required to be prepared with good quality and accuracy.  Project Governance: Set up periodic governance calls for initiatives/projects with respective teams.  Ensure initiative and projects tracking and status, consolidation of data and reports preparation for governance calls with CEO and respective stakeholder.  Establish and maintain all initiatives file, presentation and contracts or other documents well organization in folder structure with right and easy accessibility. Ensure compliance with organizational policies and procedures throughout the project/initiatives lifecycle. Define process, preparations of various operations reports or other reports and consolidation for CEO related to sales pipeline, finance, operations, employee workforce or coordinate with respective units.  Capability to understand and write contract documents, review and coordinate with legal and finance team.  Risk Management: Maintaining risk tracker - Identify, assess, and mitigate project/initiative risks to ensure successful delivery. Develop and implement risk management processes and procedures within the PMO. Stakeholder Communication: Facilitate communication and collaboration among project teams, stakeholders, and executive leadership. Prepare and present project status reports, updates, and key performance indicators to senior management. Performance Measurement: Establish key performance indicators (KPIs) and metrics to measure and monitor project performance. Implement a continuous improvement process to enhance project delivery effectiveness. Qualifications: 1. Bachelors degree in a relevant field. 2. Masters degree or MBA in business administration /operations 3. Proven experience in project management.  4. Certification in project management methodologies is a plus. 5. Excellent communication and interpersonal skills. 6. Worked in IT company and have undemanding of IT products and services.  7. Experience in managing end to end PMO function for senior leaders or CEO.  Key Skills: Project Management Excellent communication and articulation  Stakeholder Coordination Reporting and Documentation Excellent experience in using Office 365, AI tools, power point presentations, xls sheets and word documents.

column2: CitiusCloud Services LLP is looking for Nutanix Administrator to join our dynamic team and embark on a rewarding career journey      We are looking for a skilled and experienced Nutanix Administrator to join our IT team      As a Nutanix Administrator, you will be responsible for the design, implementation, configuration, and maintenance of our Nutanix hyper-converged infrastructure (HCI) environment      You will play a key role in ensuring the reliability, performance, and scalability of our infrastructure to support the organization's IT operations and business objectives        Responsibilities:        Nutanix Infrastructure Management: Design, deploy, configure, and maintain Nutanix HCI clusters to meet the organization's compute, storage, and virtualization needs      Virtualization Management: Manage and administer virtualization technologies, such as VMware vSphere or AHV, running on the Nutanix platform, including VM creation, provisioning, and performance monitoring      Storage Management: Configure and manage storage resources, including Nutanix Distributed Storage Fabric (DSF), to optimize performance, capacity, and data redundancy      Networking Management: Configure and maintain networking components, such as virtual switches, VLANs, and network policies, to ensure reliable and secure communication within the Nutanix environment      Backup and Disaster Recovery: Implement and manage backup and disaster recovery solutions, leveraging Nutanix native features or third-party tools, to protect data and ensure business continuity      Performance Monitoring: Monitor system performance, resource utilization, and capacity trends using Nutanix Prism or other monitoring tools, and implement optimization measures as needed      Troubleshooting and Issue Resolution: Diagnose and resolve technical issues and performance bottlenecks related to the Nutanix infrastructure, collaborating with vendors and other IT teams as necessary      Security and Compliance: Implement security best practices and compliance standards to protect data and ensure regulatory compliance within the Nutanix environment      Automation and Scripting: Develop and automate routine tasks and workflows using scripting languages (eg, PowerShell, Python) or automation tools (eg, Nutanix Calm, Ansible) to improve operational efficiency and reduce manual effort
column11: Administration

Slack Responsibilities:        Serve as a point of contact for the Slack Enterprise Grid as a technical resource      Support all users with app requests, channel management requests, Slack connect requests, guest account management, user group management, and user training.      Administration; Architecture; User provisioning; Settings and policies; Channel management; Application approval processes; Data security; Process design      Review existing standards and refine governance model, Slack enterprise grid, workspaces, external collaboration and partner channels      Build onto an organizational structure that will allow for maximum automation and scalability      Work with the Identity Management Team(s) for account lifecycle and security policy management      Balance user experience with security requirements      Should have sound knowledge on using/setting up of SSO in Slack integrated with indentity providers like OKTA, PingID etc.      Should have understanding of Slack Governance.                Skills    :      Ability to communicate effectively      Ability to work in a fast-paced team-oriented environment      3-5 years of experience in Slack Administration and implementation      Hands on experience managing a large-scale slack implementation as an enterprise tool      An ability to thrive in high pressure, highly flexible environment against both short- and long-term requirements      A passion for technology and an ability to identify new opportunities for efficiency and productiveness while solving problems      Ability to work effectively with team members, peers, and others in and outside the organization to accomplish goals and objectives, and to identify and resolve problems      Successful track record in working on multi-functional, cross-team projects      Horizontal knowledge of other Collab platforms for systems integration and automation support is a nice to have      Ability to learn and adapt to new technologies outside of the Collaboration tools realm for integration with Slack and help with employee productivity. Highly disciplined self-starter with solid collaboration & communication skills                         Advanced skills in Microsoft applications such as Excel (charts, formulas, macros),PowerPoint, and Visio                         Some experience with Lean or Six Sigma a plus                         Dealing with comprehensive reporting requirements a plus                         Ability to multi-task, responds well to pressure and deadlines, and work well individually and in a team environment                       Natural entrepreneurial interests a plus point                               QA Automation, Creating syntax, fine tuning syntaxes, building categories, building score cards, category validation, etc.                     60%                       Analyzing trends for process improvement, documentation, Coordinate with business stakeholders to understand functional objectives and identify areas of opportunity, etc.                       20%                     Creating WBR decks, Training, Attending Client Calls, etc.                     20%                         ?

column2: A successful candidate will be responsible for orchestrating change communication, training initiatives, and content creation related to a global ServiceNow platform for IT and non-IT processes     You ll collaborate with cross-functional teams, ensuring that platform changes, new features, and optimizations are effectively communicated and understood     Your dual focus on change management and training will empower our community to leverage ServiceNow efficiently         ?     Key Responsibilities:     ?     1.     Change Communication and OCM:     ?     o     Develop and execute a comprehensive change communication plan for ServiceNow projects and enhancements.     o     Engage with stakeholders, including end users representatives and IT teams, to ensure timely and clear communication about platform changes.     o     Create targeted messages, newsletters, and announcements to keep the community informed.     o     Monitor feedback channels and address concerns promptly.      ?     2.     Training and Knowledge Base:     ?     o     Design and orchestrate training programs for end users, covering ServiceNow features, best practices, and process workflows.     o     Collaborate with subject matter experts to create training materials, including documentation, videos, and guided tours.     o     Maintain and update the ServiceNow knowledge base, ensuring accurate and relevant content.     o     Conduct or orchestrate (mainly virtual) training sessions.     ?     3.     Content Generation:     ?     o     Proactively generate and encourage creation of content for the knowledge base, FAQs, and self-help resources.     o     Translate technical concepts into user-friendly language.     o     Develop process descriptions, step-by-step guides, and troubleshooting tips.     o     Encourage user-generated content by facilitating contributions from the community.     ?     4.     User Adoption Metrics and Feedback:     ?     o     Gather feedback from end users and IT colleagues to identify pain points and improvement opportunities.     o     Use insights to refine training materials and communication strategies.     ?     5.     Championing ServiceNow:     ?     o     Be an advocate for ServiceNow within the organization.     o     Promote the platform s benefits, efficiency gains, and positive impact on business processes.     o     Encourage collaboration and knowledge sharing among users.     ?     Qualifications:           Bachelor s degree in a relevant field (eg, Business Administration, Communications, Information Technology).         Minimum 2 years of combined experience in organizational change management and training coordination.         Familiarity with ServiceNow or other enterprise platforms. ServiceNow is a plus.         Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal.         Ability to work independently, prioritize tasks, and meet deadlines.         Proficiency in creating engaging content and facilitating training sessions.         Strong interpersonal skills and a proactive attitude.         Comfortable working in a global, cross-functional environment.

Role & responsibilities     Support the CEO primarily and provide additional support to executive team members, as directed, to ensure that company goals and objectives are accomplished and that operations run efficiently. Maintain and refine internal processes that support high-ranking executives companywide, and coordinate internal and external resources to expedite workflows. Manage communication with employees by liaising with internal and external executives on various projects and tasks. column2: Knowledge Center India (KCI) is the central engine that drives the operational value for the firm     Established in 2004, KCI has evolved over the years from purely operational efficiencies into more value-added service offerings, becoming a true business partner     There are various teams based at KCI that work with Global Offices, Practice Groups, and the Management across all aspects of the firms business life cycle     With a headcount of more than 500, the center has 5 core teams working including Experts, Research Operations, Visual Solutions, Projects/CV Capture and Digital IT, working round the clock on many mission critical elements             The Position       As a Sr. Admin Executive, you will perform administrative tasks in order to ensure efficient operations of the firm and support personnel in their duties, according to company s policies and local requirements.      ?       Admin Executive Roles & Responsibilities:         Overseeing domestic and international travel for employees (Flight tickets, hotel booking, cab, boking travel insurance, forex per diem etc.)     Handling management of operations meetings, team offsites and annual events for KCI     Performing critical admin tasks such as processing of vendor Invoices, ordering workplace supplies, monitoring housekeeping related activities including service delivery assessment of vendors, coordination of meetings with vendors for resolution of service issues     Detail-oriented and able to manage multiple priorities     Maintain confidentiality with crucial data of the organization         Candidate Profile           Required knowledge/experience:       Broad understanding of executive administrative practices and processes     Excellent knowledge of MS Office (especially Excel and Word)     Good communication and people managing skills and should be a team player     Good organizational and multi-tasking abilities     Customer service orientation         Benefits which make us unique          At EZ, we know that great people are what makes a great firm. column2: Greetings From Prochant India Pvt Ltd We are hiring for Admin Executive in Coimbatore Location. We are seeking a versatile and proactive Administrative Executive with knowledge of compliances, building infrastructures, HVAC  (Heating, Ventilation, and Air Conditioning) , Fire alarm systems, and Electricals, Facility , Asset and Vendor Management. The ideal candidate will oversee various administrative functions while ensuring compliance with building regulations and safety standards.  Roles and Responsibilities: Ensure maintenance and upkeep of all facilities, including buildings, equipment, and utilities. Conduct regular inspections, identify maintenance needs, and coordinate repairs or replacements. Enforce 	health and safety standards to create a safe work environment. Oversee housekeeping staff and ensure cleanliness and tidiness of the office premises. Coordinate cleaning schedules and ensure compliance with hygiene standards. Handle incoming calls, emails, and correspondence, directing them to appropriate departments or individuals. Assist in preparing reports, presentations, and other communication 	materials. Evaluate vendors based on performance, quality, and cost-effectiveness. Negotiate contracts and agreements with vendors to ensure favourable terms. Coordinate travel arrangements for employees, including flight bookings, hotel 	accommodations, and transportation.  Manage hotel bookings and ensure accommodations meet organization's standards and budget. Monitor 	SLAs with vendors and service providers to ensure compliance. Address any issues or discrepancies in SLAs and work towards resolution. Maintain records of company assets and equipment, track usage, and conduct regular audits. Assist in procurement of new assets as needed. Procure 	office supplies, equipment, and services as required. Manage inventory levels and conduct audits to ensure adequate stock levels. Handle incoming tickets or requests from employees and stakeholders, ensuring timely resolution. Arrange 	catering services for meetings, events, and employee meals. Collect feedback on food quality and service and make necessary adjustments. Oversee the management of Management Information Systems (MIS) to ensure 	accurate and timely reporting of data. Generate reports and analyze data to provide insights for decision-making and process improvement. Facilitate onboarding process for new employees, includes printing ID Card, 	Access Card, conducting orientations, and coordinating with relevant 	departments. Manage offboarding process for departing employees, including exits, asset retrieval, and clearance procedures. Key Competencies Deep and thorough understanding of Prochant policies and procedures. Exceptional verbal, interpersonal, and written communication skills Organized, detail-oriented and self-motivated. Ability to juggle multiple responsibilities. Professional presentation skills and confidence when speaking. Exceptional problem-solving skills to analyze issues and identify potential liabilities. Strong leadership skills to promote personal and professional development and teamwork. Ability to maintain strong professional relationships with internal teams and management. Consistent demonstration of a professional, positive attitude. A strong, working understanding of computers and an ability to self-troubleshoot simple issues. Preferred Candidate: Education:   Any Degree Minimum 2 to 4 years of experience relevant to Administration Preferred Male Candidates Benefits: Salary & Appraisal - Best in Industry Excellent learning platform with great opportunity to build career with Prochant Dinner for Night Shift Upfront Leave Credit Only 5 days working (Monday to Friday) No of openings : 1 Shift timing : Night Shift (6.30 pm IST to 3.30 am IST) Mode Of Interview : In- Person/ Teams Contact Details: Lekha Devaraj 9042246629 pi1022633@prochant.com

column2: Nexdigm hiring an Administration Professional  Chennai  US Shift Nexdigm is hiring for one of its clients  a technology services company based in Chennai. We are looking for an Admin Professional experienced in managing Travel and related expenses.  Job Description: Role: Monitor and record business spending, including operational costs and discretionary expenses such as employee travel. Managing the flow of expense reports submitted by employees. This includes verifying and validating the reports, ensuring compliance with company policies, and preparing them for reimbursement. Work to streamline expense-related procedures to increase efficiency and accuracy. Provide analysis regarding expense variances and trends, enhancing and coordinating budget and forecast processes. Skills: Proficiency in expense management tools/software (e.g., Expensify, Concur) and Microsoft Office Suite Strong attention to detail and accuracy, particularly in financial data management. Excellent organizational and time-management skills, with the ability to prioritize tasks effectively. Effective communication and interpersonal abilities. Flexibility and adaptability to handle changing priorities and tight deadlines. Experience Required:  5 to 7 years Location:  Chennai Working Model:   Virtual/ Work-from-office Shift Timings:  US shift  Your interaction with us will include: - 1st round: HR round by Nexdigm - 2nd, 3rd , and 4th round  Client (India Head, Finance Head and COO) Finally, our people are our valuable asset; if you agree with us on this, we would love to meet you! column2: Facilities Management:       Responsible for overall upkeep-repair, maintenance, replacement of office equipment and appliances.   Space management for new employees.   Co-ordinating with various departments within the plant for their requirements related to Admin work, prepare PR, follow up for material.   Co-ordination for agreements, work orders & its renewal related to Administration like Transport, Security, Canteen, Gardening, Housekeeping, Hotels, Couriers, Events etc.   Maintain clean & hygienic restroom and canteen facilities.   Preparation of Admin Budget, monitoring and controlling the same.   Responsible for managing courier facility, government posts, arranging revenue stamps, stamp paper, notary based on requirements and any other work in local market, bank, post office, etc.   Arrange for repair and maintenance through outsources services for work related to plumbing, carpentry, etc.       Office Equipment/ Assets & Stationery:       Responsible for maintenance of Office equipment, IT & Communication related accessories.   Raising PR for procurement, verify & process respective invoices with relevant approvals.   Responsible for coordinating with mobile service provider, resolving connectivity issues if any, arrange for new connections based on requirements by function or new joinees, arrange for international roaming for foreign travel of employees, verifying and processing of invoice related to the same within due date. Updating details of users as per DoT requirements on regular basis.   Responsible for I-Card, Access Card and all stationery items including legal forms, registers etc.   Ensure proper working and timely services and renewal for attendance system.   Assist with all aspects of administrative management, logistics, equipment inventory, asset tagging etc.   Responsible for all office expenses such as office supplies, equipment, maintenance, etc.   Ensure availability of daily/monthly miscellaneous requirements.       Managing Employee/ LDC Guests Requirements:       Maintain and upkeep of Front Office, Meeting/ Conference Rooms, Training Center, Medical Room, etc.   Employee relocation, travel, transportation, travel booking, temporary living assistance and costs related to it.   Maintain and upkeep of sports items and assist in arranging required items.   Arrange for stay and transportation for LDC guests, Auditors etc.   Arrange for necessary Personal Protective Equipment for guests, visitors, government officials during their visit.   Arrange for food & refreshment items for guests, visitors, government officials during their visit etc.       Canteen/ Pantry Management:       Ensure proper and timely supply of daily food, snacks, etc. as per requirements.   Ensure clean & hygienic food (lunch/dinner/snacks) & drinking water supply.   Ensure availability of daily miscellaneous requirements related to canteen.   Ensure sufficient supply of drinking water in the plant and submission of required test reports by vendor as per requirements on regular basis.   Managing caterers, timely reformation of canteen committee, canteen committee meetings, vendor audit, grievance redressal, compliances, penalties, corrective actions for improvement of services, etc.   Regular upkeep, service and availability of Water Coolers, Water Dispensers.   Upkeep and procurement of Canteen related equipment, utensils, crockery, furniture, fixtures, etc.   Verifying & processing invoices related to material supply, catering service (food supply) etc. related to canteen.   Ensure timely renewal of contract agreement/ work orders related to canteen.       Medical Facilities:       Upkeep and maintenance of Medical Room and arrangement of required items, equipment.   Maintain updated list of first aiders in the plant as well as employee list with blood groups. Review and update list of nearest hospitals and contact details on regular basis.   Co-ordinate with hospitals and departments, employees to arrange pre-placement, periodical health checkup of employees and contract workers as per compliances w.r.t Factories Act & FSSAI., ensure availability of reports for audit and compliance records.   Co-ordinate with Occupational Health Consultant and as per his advice, maintain and update health records with historical data, medical reports of employees. Communication to employees, consultation of employees with Occupational Health Consultant regarding their health based on their medical reports and historical records for personal health or any occupational health concerns.   Co-ordinate with hospital and take advice of Occupational Health Consultant in case of any critical incidents, emergency etc. or whenever required for any health issue of employee.   Take advice from Occupational Health Consultant, prepare and circulate preventive measures, do?? and don??s to employees in case of any pandemic, viral or seasonal diseases like dengue, malaria during monsoon, heat stroke during summer, prepare action plan for prevention and control as per advice of the Occupational Health Consultant or guidelines of the Government.   Verification & processing of invoice related to health checkup, first aid cases, occupational consultant fees, vaccination expenses related to FSSAI compliances etc. based on approvals.   Timely renewal of Work Orders, Contract Agreements for the above. Budgeting and ensuring the costs are within budget.       Housekeeping Management:       Maintaining good housekeeping of all areas in the Plant including open areas as well as Offices, Canteen, Washrooms, Canteens, Training Center etc.   Allotment and supervision of work assigned to Housekeeping team as per schedule, ensure availability of sufficient manpower.   Ensure availability of all House-keeping related material, repair, replacement of any related items.   Verification and processing of monthly Housekeeping Invoices including Manpower, Housekeeping Material Supply & Reimbursement costs, timely renewal/revision of Service Agreement, etc.   Also ensure the work is done in a safe manner with required PPE & work permit as applicable.   Pre-monsoon activity ??clearing storm water drains, inspect and remove any unwanted material causing unsafe condition due to heavy rains, cyclone.   Attending and resolve any Housekeeping related issues raised in internal meetings or audits having impact of Safety, Health or Environment as per LDC Policy or applicable laws.   Verifying and ensuring all housekeeping related records, formats are being maintained properly as per ISO requirements on regular basis and proper housekeeping is maintained in the plant premises.       Garden Management:       Maintaining of Garden, Plantation, Lawns, Green Belt, etc. in good condition.   Schedule and supervise daily work allotted to the Gardening team as per schedule and ensure sufficient manpower is provided by the Service Provider as per requirements of job allotted.   Ensure proper utilization of manpower provided by the Service Provider and safe working with necessary PPE and work permits as applicable.   Timely removal of grass during monsoon, regular trimming of trees, (even outside plant premises for uninterrupted electric power supply as and when required) replacement of plants and new plantations as per requirement in a well-planned manner.   Pre-monsoon activity to ensure zero damage by falling of trees/ branches due to cyclone, heavy rains.   Checking, and processing of monthly Garden Service Invoices including Manpower, Material & Reimbursement costs, timely renewal/revision of service agreement, etc.       Transportation Management:       Ensure timely service and availability of Staff Bus, Innova and Ambulance with drivers and required documents for compliances, as per the terms and conditions of the agreement/ work order. Resolving issues related to the same.   Review and implement bus route as per requirements from time to time considering safety aspect.   Arrangement of cabs on casual basis for LDC employees, guests, Auditors as per requirements based on approval and considering the cost factor.   Transport arrangements for special events like function celebrations in plant or outside plant, off-sites etc.   Maintaining logbooks on regular basis, verification and processing of invoices.   Timely renewal of contract agreement, work order for the hired vehicles.       Event Management:       Arrangements for celebration of various events like Safety Day, Republic Day, Independence Day, World Environment Day, World Food Safety Day, Off-sites etc. and facilitate for Training Programs.   Arrange for items required for arranging Pooja in the plant by any Department during special occasions, inauguration etc.   Arrangement for conference in hotel, group dinner, year-end event etc.   Arrangement for any other official events related to sales and promotion, CSR project etc.   Co-ordinate with concerned department head and fun committee for the above events, scheduling the event, communications, budgeting, approvals, payment processing based on approvals and within budget.       Experience     Any Graduate, Any Postgraduate, MBA Prefered

column1: Hiring For Sr. Executive : Facilities and Administration
column2: Job Description : Facilities Management: Oversee the maintenance, repair, and safety of facilities, including office buildings, equipment, and utilities. Develop and implement facilities management policies, procedures, and standards to ensure compliance with regulations and best practices. Coordinate with external vendors and contractors for facility repairs, renovations, and upgrades. Must have knowledge of facility security systems, access controls, and emergency preparedness plans. Office Administration: Supervise administrative third party staff on daily operations. Manage office supplies, equipment, and inventory, ensuring adequate stock levels and cost-effectiveness. Coordinate office logistics, including space planning, furniture arrangement, and layout design. Handle administrative tasks such as correspondence, scheduling, and record-keeping. Vendor Management: Identify and select vendors, contractors, and service providers for facility-related services. Negotiate contracts, service agreements, and pricing terms to optimize cost-efficiency and quality of services. Monitor vendor performance and adherence to service level agreements. Resolve issues or disputes with vendors in a timely and effective manner. Budget Planning and Management: Develop annual budgets for facility maintenance, operations, and administrative expenses. Monitor expenditures, track budget variances, and implement cost-saving initiatives. Prepare financial reports and forecasts related to facilities and administrative expenses. Compliance and Risk Management: Ensure compliance with health and safety regulations, building codes, and environmental standards. Implement policies and procedures to mitigate risks related to facility operations and workplace safety. Conduct regular inspections and audits to assess compliance and identify areas for improvement. Qualifications and Skills: Bachelor's degree in Facilities Management, Business Administration, or related field (preferred). Proven experience in facilities management, office administration, or related roles. Strong interpersonal skills. Excellent organizational and multitasking abilities, with attention to detail and accuracy. Proficiency in budgeting, financial analysis, and vendor negotiation. Knowledge of facility management software and tools for scheduling, maintenance tracking, and reporting. Familiarity with regulatory requirements and industry standards for facilities and workplace safety.

column2: Job Title: Executive Assistant  Job Summary:  The Executive Assistant is responsible for providing administrative, secretarial, and procurement support to the senior management team of Super Mani. To ensure that the company's operations are in compliance with legal and regulatory requirements, manage correspondence and communications, maintain accurate records and schedules, perform other administrative duties as assigned, and manage vendor interaction and the procurement process for the company. Key Responsibilities: Provide administrative and secretarial support to the senior management team, including managing calendars, scheduling  appointments, and organizing meetings. Handle correspondence and communications, including drafting and preparing documents, memos, and emails. Maintain accurate records and files, including legal documents, contracts, and agreements. Ensure compliance with legal and regulatory requirements, including maintaining corporate records and meeting minutes. Manage and update databases, spreadsheets, and other electronic files. Handle incoming and outgoing mail and packages. Provide support for special projects, events, and initiatives as assigned. Assist with travel arrangements and booking accommodations. Provide general office support, such as answering phones, greeting visitors, and maintaining office supplies and equipment. Perform other administrative duties as  required. Develop and implement purchasing strategies for the Central Kitchen. Identify potential suppliers and conduct research to determine the best products and services at the best price. Evaluate suppliers based on price, quality,  and delivery speed. Support the procurement process from start to finish, including negotiating contracts and terms of payment. Work with Outlets and Central Kitchen to ensure that the procurement process meets their needs. Track orders and ensure timely delivery of goods and services. Monitor and forecast upcoming levels of demand      for goods. Ensure that purchasing activities comply with      relevant policies, procedures, and legal requirements. Maintain accurate records of purchases and      inventory. Resolve disputes and vendor complaints. Prepare weekly reports of Issues, status and progress      across outlets and central kitchen.  Qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Commerce, business administration, secretarial studies, or a related field. Minimum of 2 years of experience in a similar role, preferably in the QSR industry. Strong organizational, communication, and interpersonal skills. Excellent attention to detail and ability to prioritize and manage multiple tasks. Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite and other office software applications. Knowledge of legal and regulatory requirements related to corporate governance, record-keeping, and procurement. Ability to maintain confidentiality and discretion in handling sensitive information. Experience in procurement and purchasing processes. Other Requirements: Preferred, candidates who are south Indian and/or have experience in cooking south Indian food and/or have a taste for south Indian cuisine and/or have spent extensive time in south india Must be able to sit for extended periods of time. Ability to work in a fast-paced environment and handle stressful situations. This job description is intended to convey information essential to understanding the scope of the Executive Assistants position and is not an exhaustive list of skills, efforts, duties, or responsibilities associated with it. The job duties and requirements may be subject to change based on the needs of the company.

column2: Job Description:  We are seeking a dedicated and proactive Executive Assistant to support the Director in managing administrative tasks and ensuring smooth operations at Presidency School Yelhanka. As an Executive Assistant, you will play a crucial role in facilitating communication, coordinating schedules, and handling various responsibilities to assist the Director in achieving organizational goals. Key Responsibilities: Serve as the primary point of contact for internal and external stakeholders, including parents, staff, and community members. Manage the Director's calendar, schedule appointments, and coordinate meetings and events. Prepare agendas, documents, and presentations for meetings and ensure timely distribution to attendees. Act as a liaison between the Director and other departments within the school, ensuring effective communication and collaboration. Handle incoming calls, emails, and correspondence, prioritizing and responding to inquiries in a professional manner. Assist in preparing reports, memos, and other documents as requested by the Director. Coordinate travel arrangements and accommodations for the Director and other senior staff members. Maintain confidentiality and handle sensitive information with discretion and integrity. Perform administrative tasks such as filing, organizing documents, and maintaining office supplies. Requirements: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Education, or related field preferred. Proven experience as an Executive Assistant or similar role, preferably in the education sector. Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to interact effectively with individuals at all levels. Strong organizational skills and attention to detail, with the ability to prioritize tasks and manage multiple deadlines. Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite (Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook) and other relevant software applications. Ability to maintain confidentiality and handle sensitive information with discretion. Flexibility and adaptability to work in a fast-paced environment and handle changing priorities. Positive attitude, proactive mindset, and willingness to take initiative. Knowledge of school operations and educational processes is a plus. Benefits: Competitive salary package commensurate with experience. Opportunities for professional growth and development. Pleasant working environment with a supportive team. Comprehensive benefits package including health insurance and retirement plans.

column2: Job Description: Executive Assistant Position Overview: We are seeking a highly organized and proactive Executive Assistant to provide comprehensive administrative support to our executive team. The ideal candidate will be adept at managing multiple tasks simultaneously, possess exceptional communication skills, and demonstrate a high level of professionalism and discretion. Responsibilities: Calendar Management: Coordinate and manage the executives' schedules, including arranging meetings, appointments, and travel arrangements. Communication: Serve as the primary point of contact for internal and external stakeholders, screening and directing inquiries appropriately. Administrative Support: Provide administrative assistance such as drafting correspondence, preparing reports, and handling expense reports. Meeting Coordination: Schedule and organize meetings, prepare agendas, and ensure all necessary materials are available in advance. Travel Arrangements: Arrange travel logistics including flights, accommodations, and transportation, ensuring efficiency and cost-effectiveness. Documentation and Filing: Maintain organized electronic and physical filing systems, ensuring easy retrieval of information when needed. Special Projects: Assist with ad-hoc projects as assigned, demonstrating flexibility and a willingness to take on new challenges. Confidentiality: Handle sensitive information with discretion and maintain confidentiality at all times. Relationship Management: Build and maintain positive relationships with internal and external stakeholders, fostering a collaborative and productive work environment. Prioritization: Manage competing priorities effectively, ensuring that urgent matters are addressed promptly while maintaining long-term strategic focus. Qualifications: Proven Experience: Previous experience in an executive support role, preferably supporting C-suite executives. Organizational Skills: Exceptional organizational and time management skills, with the ability to prioritize tasks effectively. Communication: Excellent written and verbal communication skills, with a professional and polished demeanor. Tech-savvy: Proficiency in Microsoft Office suite (Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook) and familiarity with office productivity tools. Discretion: Ability to handle confidential information with sensitivity and maintain a high level of professionalism. Adaptability: Flexibility to adapt to changing priorities and work well under pressure in a fast-paced environment. Problem-Solving: Strong problem-solving skills with the ability to anticipate needs and proactively address challenges. Attention to Detail: Meticulous attention to detail and accuracy in all tasks. Team Player: Collaborative attitude with a willingness to support colleagues and contribute to the overall success of the team. Bachelor's Degree: Bachelor's degree or equivalent experience preferred.

column2: Profile for Executive Assistant   Position:  Executive Assistant  Location:  Remote. However, since Mr. Karan Singh Thakral and Satveer Singh Thakral manage business in India and travel to India often, so the candidate would be required to report in person whenever called. Reporting to:  Mr. Karan Singh Thakral and Satveer Singh Thakral Compensation:  As per Industry standard   About theThakral Group The Thakral Group has businesses in real estate, technology, consumer product distribution, manufacturing, and retail. The group is headquartered in Singapore and has offices running across 30 countries. About the job We are looking to onboard for the position of an Executive Assistant (EA) to Mr. Karan Singh Thakral (an Executive Director of the Thakral Group) and his son, Mr. Satveer Singh Thakral. The candidate will be responsible for providing dedicated and efficient secretarial & administrative support and shall be responsible for overseeing and managing various support based functions. This dynamic position requires the candidates ability to anticipate needs and offer problem solving solutions while maintaining a high level of professionalism and confidentiality.   Job Description : Organizing and maintaining calendar appointments, day to day schedules and meetings Arrangement and management of frequent domestic and international travel including liaising with internal and external contacts for all bookings, reservations, meetings and all such ancillary items. This will also include ensuring preparation of detailed itineraries during such travel Tracking of commitments, actionable items, agendas and responsibilities and updating the same on a timely basis so as to ensure that all deadlines are met Maintenance of records of correspondences and business dealings for present and future references (which includes maintenance and filing/archiving of all kinds of information) Transcribing and maintaining records from dictation, correspondences, reports or other such material, which is of critical or sensitive or confidential nature Management of documentation, reports and presentations; collection and preparation of information for meetings; maintaining contact lists etc. Serving as the primary point of contact for internal and external communication and coordination on all matters including those of a highly confidential and critical nature. Providing support towards checking, screening and routing emails and calls; responding on actionable items as required and ensuring receiving and delivery of accurate and detailed communication Processing and tracking of all expenses, financial information, credit card statements and such ancillary items as required by internal processes Organizing & coordinating with concerned stakeholders regarding appointments, bookings & reservations Assistance with personal logistics   Additional Requirements  Prior experience in communication and interaction with senior management positions like Chief Executive Officer, Managing Director, President/Vice President of companies Excellent verbal and written communication skills Demonstrating leadership to maintain credibility, trust and support  Exceptional attention to detail   Qualification, Experience and Key skills: Minimum 8-10 years experience as an Executive/Personal Assistant to top level management officials  Proficient in Outlook, PowerPoint, Word and Excel and comfortable using online tools. Ability to work quickly and accurately  Being proactive and able to take initiative Experience in understanding of board level information for capturing and maintenance of such information. Ability to take ownership of tasks and projects and ensuring smooth completion of the same.  Organizational and multi-tasking skills  ability to prioritize and effectively manage a variety of tasks.  Highly resilient, organized and able to cope in a fast-paced environment, being both flexible and able to work across a range of issues. Excellent interpersonal and team skills. Ability to maintain discretion and judgment in handling highly confidential/critical information.

column2: Role & responsibilities     An Executive Assistant is dynamic and multifaceted, requiring strong organizational skills, attention to detail, excellent communication abilities, and the ability to work effectively under pressure. They play a crucial role in supporting executives and ensuring the smooth operation of the organization.   1.  Administrative Support : Executive Assistants provide high-level administrative support to executives, including managing schedules, arranging appointments, organizing meetings, and handling correspondence.   2.  Calendar Management : They are responsible for managing the executive's calendar, scheduling meetings, appointments, and travel arrangements. This may involve coordinating with other team members, clients, or external stakeholders. 3.  Communication : Executive Assistants often serve as a primary point of contact for internal and external communication on behalf of the executive. This includes answering phone calls, responding to emails, and relaying messages accurately and efficiently. Preferred candidate profile   MBA or Any Graduate

column2: About Us  : Brego Land?(www.bregoland.com) was founded and established to make investing in?land?accessible, straightforward, and transparent when we realized that the majority of ordinary investors were excluded from the market owing to the cost and knowledge barrier required to buy?land. The?land?is expensive, difficult to find, illiquid, and requires a lot of paperwork. With its digital?land?investment platform for fractional investments,?Brego Land provides investors with solutions to all of these issues. The task of acquiring, repurchasing, and developing the?land?will also be taken care of by?Brego.?    Mode of Operation:  Work from Office Timing:  10 am to 7 pm Location: 1st Floor, Raghuvanshi Mansion, Raghuvanshi Mill, Next to Phoenix Palladium Mall, Lower Parel, Mumbai. Job Overview We are seeking a highly motivated and detail-oriented Admin/ Sourcing Executive to join our team. The Admin /Sourcing  Executive will be responsible for identifying, evaluating, and negotiating with suppliers to secure the best possible deals on materials and services required for our projects. The ideal candidate will have strong analytical skills, excellent communication abilities, and a proven track record of successful sourcing and procurement  Job Description:   Research potential suppliers and conduct thorough evaluations to assess their capabilities, reliability, and suitability for Brego Land's requirements. Maintain a database of qualified suppliers and update relevant information regularly. Negotiate pricing, terms, and contracts with suppliers to ensure cost-effective procurement while maintaining quality standards. Collaborate with internal stakeholders to understand their requirements and negotiate contracts that meet their needs. Monitor and analyze market trends, pricing, and availability of materials and services to identify opportunities for cost savings and efficiency improvements. Coordinate with logistics and inventory teams to ensure timely delivery of materials and maintain optimal inventory levels. Implement quality control measures to ensure that all procured materials and services meet Brego Land's standards and specifications. Ensure compliance with relevant laws, regulations, and company policies in all sourcing activities  Cultivate strong relationships with suppliers to foster collaboration, resolve issues, and drive continuous improvement. Act as the primary point of contact for supplier inquiries, concerns, and feedback .  Skills Excellent negotiation skills Ability to communicate in Marathi, Hindi & English  Able to travel up to two weeks per month for site visits. Excellent organizational skills. Proactive, with the ability to handle uncertainty. Benefits Social club This allows you to know yourself better. Investment club Gives you knowledge about the recent investment market trend Books Club Helps you grow and expand your knowledge. Sports Club- Leads to a healthy life. Add on to that In-House Training and Seminars.
