column2: The Technical Data Services Team is looking for an innovative, enthusiastic, and versatile Sharepoint Administrator to manage the Siemens-Energy AGT technical organizations SharePoint environment, including design of physical and logical architecture, performance tuning, and ongoing system refinement.         Reporting to the Head of Technical Services, this is a key role and the Technical Administrator will ensure our internal employees, Vendors and Customers can access the technical documentation required for their specific functional requirements and commercial agreements.         This role requires a technical individual with a deep understanding of SharePoint architecture and the ability to translate business requirements into effective SharePoint solutions. The successful candidate must be a self-starter, capable of managing complex projects and communicating effectively with a wide range of stakeholders.         Additionally, the role will support the collection of data for supporting the Cost-Out Managers programmes within the Product Life Cycle (PLC) team in AGT.     The AGT PLC team includes This involves understanding the component cost and how do we continue to deliver our AGT Cost-Out targets.                 LET S TALK ABOUT YOU                 Your profile:                         Efficient at communication at different levels of organisation and articulating data requirements concepts in clear engaging terms                     Attention to detail and an appreciation for data and process improvements                     An analytical mind set, as well as an inquisitive, methodical approach             Experience and Qualifications:                         Proven experience of 1 to 3 years as a SharePoint Administration / Architecture or similar role.                             Excellent problem-solving, communication, and interpersonal skills.                     Experience of the gas turbine construction, maintenance basic operation                     Have an ability to interpret large volumes of complex technical data                     Excellent written and verbal communication skills are required (Technical English), and you will be able to interact at all levels, demonstrate initiative and be a flexible self-starter.             Your responsibilities:                         Represent the company and actively participate in a team to achieve deliverables of the AGT Technical Sharepoint                     Trouble shooting the AGT Sharepoint whilst working closely with the Data team, that maintains the Customer Extranet Portal (CEP)                     Coaching and support other team members, sharing your knowledge and expertise                     Supporting ad-hoc projects and implement improvements in tools, methods, and processes

column2: Overview Continental develops pioneering technologies and services for sustainable and connected mobility of people and their goods. Founded in 1871, the technology company offers safe, efficient, intelligent and affordable solutions for vehicles, machines, traffic and transportation. In 2022, Continental generated sales of 39.4 billion and currently employs around 200,000 people in 57 countries and markets.  On October 8, 2021, the company celebrated its 150th anniversary.  Specialties Global Automotive Supplier, Tires, Software Development, Automated Driving, Driver Assistance Systems, Global Industrial Supplier, Internet of Things, Blockchain, Connectivity, continental engineering services, continental business consulting, vehicle networking and information, and autonomous mobility and safety     The Automotive group sector comprises technologies for passive safety, brake, chassis, motion and motion control systems. Innovative solutions for assisted and automated driving, display and operating technologies, as well as audio and camera solutions for the vehicle interior, are also part of the portfolio, as is intelligent information and communication technology for the mobility services of fleet operators and commercial vehicle manufacturers. Comprehensive activities relating to connectivity technologies, vehicle electronics and high-performance computers round off the range of products and services. https://www.continental.com/en Position: Team Executive Years of Experience: 4 to 8 Years  Job Location: Bangalore  Electronic City  Job Permanent: On Contract (through Manpower Payroll) Requirements and skills Being the point of contact for general communications      with their boss. column2: Role & responsibilities   A personal assistant (PA) typically carries out administrative work on behalf of one individual, unlike an administrator who tends to look after a team. This individual is usually a manager or executive in a commercial, not-for-profit or public sector organization. The role of a PA is to free an executives time from administrative duties so that they can spend maximum time on strategic tasks.  Maintain a list of all personal tasks to be done and execute all delegated tasks in a timely manner. Draft emails as per instructions given by the Director and maintain a folder with all relevant mail templates. Organize travel including hotel bookings and airline bookings. Coordinate with various departments and locations to ensure timely completion of delegated tasks. Ensure following company protocol during visits of company guests. Keep minutes of important meetings and organize them to be accessible by the Director at all times. Ensure timely submission of weekly reports. Keep track of office expenses against provided budgets.  Organize all official employee and administrative records. Organizing and participating in various office functions.  Maintain all annual maintenance contracts to ensure smooth functioning of office infrastructure.  Preferred candidate profile     A.   Qualifications and Education Requirements:  Must hold a Bachelor's degree in any discipline.   Minimum experience of 5 years in secretarial/ administrative positions.   Basic knowledge of computer operations.   Fluency in Hindi, English and Marathi. B.   Preferred Skills and Qualifications:  Basic knowledge of MS word, MS excel and Google calendar.  C.   Personal Attributes:  Excellent organizational abilities.   Clear and concise communicator.   Self-motivated, outgoing personality, who is able to work independently, without supervision.  Must have the ability to be discreet and maintain confidentiality

column2: Role & responsibilities   Position Summary The Executive Assistant will provide high-level administrative support to the Managing Director, ensuring efficient operation and organization. This role requires excellent organizational skills, attention to detail, and the ability to handle multiple tasks in a fast-paced environment. Key Responsibilities  1. Administrative Support -  Manage the Managing Directors calendar, schedule meetings, and coordinate travel arrangements. 2. Communication - Act as the primary point of contact between the Managing Director and internal/external stakeholders. Handle correspondence, emails, and phone calls professionally. 3. Document Management -  Prepare, review, and edit reports, presentations, and other documents. Maintain confidential files and records. 4. Meeting Coordination - Organize and prepare for meetings, including agenda preparation, minute-taking, and follow-up on action items. 5. Project Assistance - Assist with special projects, research, and data analysis as required. 6. Event Planning - Coordinate company events, meetings, and conferences as needed. 7. Office Management - Ensure the smooth operation of the office, including supplies management and liaising with vendors and service providers. 8. Miscellaneous Tasks - Handle any other duties as assigned by the Managing Director.   Skills 1. Exceptional organizational and time-management abilities. 2. Strong written and verbal communication skills. 3. Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite (Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook). 4. Ability to handle sensitive information with discretion. 5. Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail. 6. Ability to work independently and as part of a team. 7. High level of professionalism and a positive attitude. Perks and benefits     3RD SAT AND ALL Sunday Off   GMC Policy   GPA Policy

column2: A personal assistant at IndiaFilings would likely have a diverse set of responsibilities, given the nature of the company's services in business and legal compliance. Here are some of the key responsibilities that a personal assistant might handle in such a role:  Role & responsibilities     1. Administrative Support Calendar Management:  Schedule and manage appointments, meetings, and conferences. Travel Arrangements:  Organize travel itineraries, including flights, accommodation, and transportation. Document Preparation:  Prepare and edit correspondence, communications, presentations, and other documents. File Management:  Maintain and organize files, both physical and electronic. 2. Client Interaction Client Communication:  Handle calls, emails, and other communications with clients, ensuring timely and accurate responses. Customer Support:  Assist clients with inquiries and provide information about services offered by IndiaFilings. 3. Office Coordination Meeting Coordination:  Arrange meetings, including preparing agendas, taking minutes, and following up on action items. Office Supplies:  Manage inventory and procurement of office supplies and equipment. Event Planning:  Assist in organizing company events, workshops, and seminars. 4. Project Management Task Management:  Track and manage tasks assigned to various team members, ensuring deadlines are met. Project Coordination:  Assist in coordinating and monitoring the progress of various projects within the company. 5. Financial Assistance Expense Reports:  Prepare and submit expense reports for approval. Invoice Management:  Handle invoicing and follow up on payments with clients. 6. Research and Analysis Market Research:  Conduct research on industry trends, competitors, and potential clients. Data Analysis:  Compile and analyze data to support decision-making processes. 7. Personal Tasks Personal Errands:  Handle personal errands and tasks for senior executives, as needed. Confidential Matters:  Manage sensitive information with discretion and maintain confidentiality. 8. Compliance and Documentation Regulatory Compliance:  Assist with compliance-related tasks, ensuring all legal and regulatory requirements are met. Documentation:  Maintain accurate records and documentation related to company operations and client interactions.   Skills and Qualifications Education:  Bachelor's degree in business administration, management, or a related field. Experience:  Previous experience as a personal assistant or in a similar administrative role.(  Fresher also consider  Skills:  Excellent organizational, communication, and interpersonal skills. Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite and other relevant software. Attributes:  Discretion, reliability, and the ability to work independently and manage multiple tasks simultaneously. These responsibilities can vary based on the specific needs of the company and the executives being supported. The role of a personal assistant is dynamic and requires a high level of adaptability and proactive problem-solving skills. Further we also invite you for the F2F interview daily walk-in on the below?mentioned address. Company type  - Corporate Location  ADDRESS- IndiaFilings pvt. ltd. Aurum PropTech Ltd (Majesco Ltd), 6th Floor, Millenium Business Park, Mahape, Navi Mumbai, Maharashtra 400710. Interview time 10 am to 2 pm Meet Senior HR  Reenu

column2: As the Organizational Change Management and Training Coordinator, you will be the bridge between technology enhancements and our community of end users and IT colleagues.     ?Your mission is to facilitate smooth transitions in our monthly release, enhance user experiences, and drive adoption of ServiceNow - combining both organizational change management and training responsibilities.       Position Summary:       A successful candidate will be responsible for orchestrating change communication, training initiatives, and content creation related to a global ServiceNow platform for IT and non-IT processes     You ll collaborate with cross-functional teams, ensuring that platform changes, new features, and optimizations are effectively communicated and understood     Your dual focus on change management and training will empower our community to leverage ServiceNow efficiently       Key Responsibilities:     1.     Change Communication and OCM:     o     Develop and execute a comprehensive change communication plan for ServiceNow projects and enhancements.     o     Engage with stakeholders, including end users representatives and IT teams, to ensure timely and clear communication about platform changes.     o     Create targeted messages, newsletters, and announcements to keep the community informed.     o     Monitor feedback channels and address concerns promptly.      2.     Training and Knowledge Base:     o     Design and orchestrate training programs for end users, covering ServiceNow features, best practices, and process workflows.     o     Collaborate with subject matter experts to create training materials, including documentation, videos, and guided tours.     o     Maintain and update the ServiceNow knowledge base, ensuring accurate and relevant content.     o     Conduct or orchestrate (mainly virtual) training sessions.     3.     Content Generation:     o     Proactively generate and encourage creation of content for the knowledge base, FAQs, and self-help resources.     o     Translate technical concepts into user-friendly language.     o     Develop process descriptions, step-by-step guides, and troubleshooting tips.     o     Encourage user-generated content by facilitating contributions from the community.     4.     User Adoption Metrics and Feedback:     o     Gather feedback from end users and IT colleagues to identify pain points and improvement opportunities.     o     Use insights to refine training materials and communication strategies.     5.     Championing ServiceNow:     o     Be an advocate for ServiceNow within the organization.     o     Promote the platform s benefits, efficiency gains, and positive impact on business processes.     o     Encourage collaboration and knowledge sharing among users.     Qualifications:         oBachelor s degree in a relevant field (e.g., Business Administration, oCommunications, Information Technology).         oMinimum 2 years of combined experience in organizational change management and training coordination.         oFamiliarity with ServiceNow or other enterprise platforms. ServiceNow is a plus.         oExcellent communication skills, both written and verbal.         oAbility to work independently, prioritize tasks, and meet deadlines.         oProficiency in creating engaging content and facilitating training sessions.         oStrong interpersonal skills and a proactive attitude.         oComfortable working in a global, cross-functional environment.
column11: Training, Business administration, Training coordination, Change management, Interpersonal skills, Training Coordinator, content generation, Advocate, Troubleshooting, Information technology

column2: Deputy Registrars & Asst. Registrars SSPU  Pune, Maharashtra, India (On-site) Position Overview Symbiosis Open Education Society is looking to fill the positions of Deputy Registrars / Assistant Registrars, SSPU welcomes applications from candidates seeking challenging, productive, satisfying careers. Position Responsibilities Administer the daily operations of the Registrar's Office viz. Statutory Compliances, Student Section, Establishment Section, Examination section, Legal Section etc. He should assist to Registrar in smooth functioning of the activities of the University. Organize and administer the academic functions, in order to provide maximum service to students while ensuring efficient and effective workflow. Supervise the coordination, evaluation and certification of all graduation applications, while overseeing the complete graduation process to include all elements of the rehearsal and ceremony. Responsible for collecting, recording, maintaining and reporting of student records within UGC guidelines, e.g., grades, registration data, transcripts, mid-term verification, athletic eligibility and other associated audits. Provide leadership and develop appropriate recommendations for the implementation of related technology application in support of enhanced services offered through Registration and Records. Develop and administer the departmental budget Research, analysis and resolution of student disputes as they relate to records and registration Collaborate with administrators, deans, faculty, IT and counselors to facilitate and improve services to students, including catalog and registration/records policy questions. Coordinate, control and regulate all activities of administration, human resources, Finance & Accounts and other related matters for efficient functioning of the University Execute and administer the outsourcing contracts for various services of the University. Any other related work assigned from time to time by the management Position Requirements Applicants should have 6 to 8 years of work experience as Deputy Registrar/Assistant Registrar. They should have a Masters degree or an equivalent postgraduate degree. PhD Candidates will be given the preference. Prior experience in higher educational academic management and administration is desirable. Skills required: Strong sense of responsibility and initiative Collegiality and ability to work as part of a team Strong interpersonal and communication skills (oral and written) Good grasp of academics and higher education in India and abroad Strong administrative and organizational abilities Strong Professional ethics Well versed with Marathi Language. Venue of work:  The work location is Symbiosis Skills and Professional University campus at Kiwale, Mumbai Pune Highway Pune Maharashtra. Days of work:  This is a full-time job, Monday - Saturday, 9:30 AM to 5:30 PM Starting date:  The selected candidate will be expected to join as soon as possible. Application:  Please submit your applications on below link  https://sspu.ac.in/careers/

column2: JOB   DESCRIPTION Position   Title:   Secretary,   Chancellor   Level:   Associate Reporting   to:   Chancellor,   Sai   University   Location:   Chennai Role   Summary:  As the Secretary to the Chancellor, you will play a pivotal role in providing high-level administrative and secretarial support to the Chancellor of the organization or institution. Your primary responsibility is to ensure the smooth functioning of the Chancellor's office by managing communication, coordinating schedules, and handling a variety of administrative tasks. This position requires a highly organized and detail-oriented individual with excellent communication skills and the ability to maintain confidentiality. Responsibilities: - Be an integral team member of the Chancellors Office in providing assistance and support in executing, managing,  successfully implementing and ensuring the completion of the University wide strategic projects, new initiatives  and operational activities. - Provides confidential administrative support to the Chancellor including but not limited to preparation of  correspondence, attending to calls, organising the calendar, liaising with internal & external stakeholders especially  board members etc. - Manage & review filing both electronic and paper files, manage office systems, prepare presentations, minutes of  meetings and reports under the guidance of the Chancellor. - Make arrangements for appointments, meetings and coordinate for the same from end to end. - Taking briefs and directions from the Chancellor to manage his priorities and executing efficient and effective service delivery. - Organize travel and prepare travel itineraries, and related logistics. - Able to plan, organize and manage events. - Exercises initiative and independent judgement in the daily activities of the office. - Safeguards the confidentiality of University administration by exercising tact and discretion in communicating  information to faculty, students, staff, and the various publics served by the University and in handling  administrative records, files, and similar confidential items. Key   Skills: - Relevant and considerable experience to support positions at the top management/senior level with grace,  patience and sophistication. - Discreet and able to manage a contemporary technology-driven office. - Have an eye for detail, multi-tasker with great follow-up skills. - Highly organised and proactive, able to think independently and act efficiently. - Extremely polished and professional written & verbal communication skills. - Ability to take charge of activities in collaboration with various stakeholders and execute tasks effectively. - Possess strong interpersonal and human skills. - Ability to learn within a new and dynamic organization.  Qualification: - Graduate / Post graduate with 1-2 years of experience

column2: To ensure the smooth implementation of all projects and related work, by meeting the administration needs of a growing organization, we are looking for an Executive Assistant to work directly with our CEO and Founders. They will also collaborate with other verticals and leadership to ensure smooth operations.                In the long run, this role has the potential to grow into a team of admin support to other leaders and teams. Based on an employee s performance we are open to exploring options here. We are a fast-growing company and are committed to the long-term career growth of all employees.                You will be a part of a rapidly growing team of smart, purpose-driven, and motivated people, which will give you a chance to try new things, take initiative, make mistakes, and grow.                We are actively looking to host people from underrepresented and marginalized backgrounds. If comfortable, please share your social location in relevant fields in this form. Support managers use these templates and keep a central register of signed official documents          Assist the People Ops, Finance, and IT teams on other operational tasks as and when required          Help plan events such as partner visits, interview days, occasional travel, and team gatherings          Miscellaneous administrative and operational tasks          Perform other related work as needed                What should you be comfortable with            A dynamic environment with competing priorities.          Working in a team with shared responsibilities.          Independently coordinating with coworkers to accomplish goals.          Being resourceful in new environments and scenarios.          Problem-solving in high-pressure environments.          Adapting your approach, being focused on the problem and not being stuck to one idea or way of solving a problem.

column2: **Responsibilities**: 1. **Patient Management**:    - Schedule patient appointments and manage the appointment calendar efficiently.    - Greet patients, check them in, and provide necessary paperwork for completion.    - Maintain accurate patient records and update demographic and insurance information as needed.    - Ensure patient confidentiality and compliance with HIPAA regulations. 2. **Administrative Duties**:    - Oversee front desk operations, including answering phones, responding to inquiries, and managing mail and email correspondence.    - Coordinate with medical staff to ensure smooth patient flow and optimize appointment scheduling.    - Manage inventory of office and medical supplies, and coordinate procurement as necessary.    - Handle billing and insurance claims processing, ensuring accuracy and timely submission. 3. **Staff Coordination**:    - Supervise administrative staff, including receptionists and medical office assistants, and provide guidance and support as needed.    - Conduct staff training on administrative procedures, patient management protocols, and compliance standards.    - Foster a positive work environment and promote effective communication among team members. 4. **Quality Assurance**:    - Implement and maintain quality assurance protocols to ensure adherence to regulatory standards and best practices.    - Conduct periodic audits of administrative processes and patient records to identify areas for improvement.    - Collaborate with healthcare providers and staff to address any issues or concerns related to administrative operations. **Requirements**: - Master's degree in Healthcare Administration, Business Administration, or a related field. - Previous experience working in a medical office or healthcare setting, with a strong understanding of medical terminology and procedures. - Proficiency in computer skills, including knowledge of electronic medical records (EMR) systems and Microsoft Office Suite. - Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to interact effectively with patients, staff, and healthcare providers. - Strong organizational skills and attention to detail, with the ability to prioritize tasks and manage multiple responsibilities. - Knowledge of HIPAA regulations and healthcare compliance standards. - Leadership abilities with a focus on teamwork and collaboration. - Certification in Medical Office Administration or Healthcare Management is preferred but not required.

column2: Role & responsibilities       Overview: We are seeking a highly organized and dynamic individual to serve as the Assistant to CEO. This role will be pivotal in ensuring smooth operations at the executive level, managing calendars, coordinating travel, analysing data, preparing presentations, and maintaining records of meetings. The ideal candidate will possess exceptional communication skills, meticulous attention to detail, and the ability to handle multiple tasks simultaneously in a fast-paced environment. Responsibilities: 1. Calendar Management: - Effectively manage the CEO's calendar, scheduling appointments, meetings, and conferences. - Coordinate with internal and external stakeholders to prioritize appointments and ensure the CEO's schedule aligns with strategic objectives. - Anticipate scheduling conflicts and proactively resolve them to optimize the CEO's time. 2. Data Analytics: - Collect, analyse, and interpret data relevant to the CEO's projects and initiatives. - Prepare comprehensive reports and presentations based on data analysis to aid decision-making processes. - Utilize analytical tools and methodologies to provide insights into key performance indicators and business trends. 3. Presentation Development: - Collaborate with the CEO and other team members to develop high-quality presentations for internal and external audiences. - Create visually appealing slides, charts, and graphs to effectively communicate complex ideas and information. - Ensure presentation materials are accurate, concise, and aligned with the organization's branding guidelines. 4. Minutes of Meeting: - Attend meetings with the CEO and key stakeholders, capturing accurate minutes and action items. - Prepare and distribute meeting agendas, materials, and follow-up communications as necessary. - Maintain a repository of meeting minutes and ensure timely dissemination to relevant parties. 5. Travel Arrangements: - Coordinate all travel logistics for the CEO, including transportation, accommodation, and itinerary planning. - Handle visa applications, travel insurance, and other travel-related documentation. - Anticipate and address any travel disruptions or emergencies, providing timely support and solutions. Qualifications: - Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Management, or related field. Master's degree preferred. - Proven experience in a similar role, preferably supporting C-suite executives. - Strong proficiency in data analysis tools (e.g., Excel, Tableau) and presentation software (e.g., PowerPoint). - Exceptional organizational and time management skills, with the ability to prioritize tasks effectively. - Excellent written and verbal communication skills, with keen attention to detail. - Ability to maintain confidentiality and discretion when handling sensitive information. - Flexibility to adapt to changing priorities and work independently with minimal supervision. - Previous experience in project management or operations is a plus. This position offers an exciting opportunity to work closely with the CEO and contribute to the success of the organization's strategic objectives. If you are a proactive and results-driven professional with a passion for driving efficiency and excellence, we encourage you to apply.

column2: An "Executive" is typically a mid-level position within an organization     Executives are responsible for specific tasks, projects, or functions within their department or area of expertise     They often report to higher-level managers or directors and may supervise more junior staff members     The role of an Executive can vary widely depending on the organization, and it may encompass areas such as finance, marketing, operations, or human resources, among others     A "Senior Executive" holds a higher-level position within an organization compared to a standard Executive     Senior Executives typically have more experience, greater responsibility, and more significant decision-making authority     They may lead larger teams, manage more complex projects, and play a key role in shaping the strategies and policies of their department or division     Senior Executives often have a deeper understanding of their area of expertise and contribute to the development of the organization's goals and objectives

Process and submit expense reports in a timely manner,  adhering to company policies. 7. Confidentiality: Handle sensitive and confidential information with  the utmost discretion. Project Coordination: Assist in the planning, execution, and  monitoring of various projects, investments, new ventures & initiatives. Office Operations: Support office operations by ordering supplies,  managing office equipment, and coordinating maintenance requests. 10. Prioritization and Problem Solving: Assess incoming requests and  tasks, prioritize based on importance and urgency, and proactively  address issues as they arise. 11. Relationship Building: Build and maintain positive relationships with  internal team members, external partners, clients, and stakeholders. column2: Company Vision: NowPurchase is building a rich, digital marketplace where metal manufacturers can procure high quality raw materials in a trusted manner. Our technology allows them to optimize their manufacturing process to ensure high productivity and resilience to failure. Here is a sneak peek to one of our products- https://youtu.be/664mYn1fjQs Position Overview: We're looking for an enthusiastic and organized individual to join our fast-paced team as an Assistant Executive Coordinator/Admin Assistant. This role will primarily involve providing support to the Founder's Office by collaborating with respective stakeholders to ensure process adherence & assisting in managing administrative tasks to ensure smooth operations within the executive office. The ideal candidate will be proactive, detail-oriented, and able to thrive in a fast-paced environment. Female candidates will be preferred for this role. Key Responsibilities: Collaborate with team members to ensure timely completion of tasks and deliverables. Prepare documents, presentations, and reports as required. Assist in the coordination and execution of projects and initiatives as assigned. Proactively handling administrative tasks and problem-solving as needed. Liaise with internal departments and external stakeholders maintaining professionalism and confidentiality Preferred Skills & Qualifications : Bachelor's degree 1-4yrs Proven experience in an administrative or executive support role preferred. Strong organizational skills with the ability to multitask and prioritize effectively. Excellent verbal & written communication and interpersonal skills. Proficiency in  Microsoft Office Suite (Word, Excel, PowerPoint) & G-Suite. Discretion and confidentiality in handling sensitive information. Ability to adapt to changing priorities and work well under pressure. This position offers a unique opportunity to work closely with the Founder's Office and gain valuable insights into executive-level management while providing essential support to ensure the smooth functioning of the executive office. If you are a self-motivated individual with a passion for organization and a keen attention to detail, we encourage you to apply for this exciting role. Compensation & Benefits: Compensation: As per industry standards & pedigree of candidate. Medical Insurance: Benefits of group insurance of 3 lakhs for family including parents, spouse, children. Accidental Insurance: Benefits of 5 lakhs of medical insurance for self, covering 24*7 Generous leave structure. Hiring Process: Screening of applicants & initial telephonic call with HR F2F Interview with Hiring Manager Final round with Founder & CEO Email communication on final feedback The end-to-end process shall take less than 10 days. We pride ourselves on being transparent & moving fast. Candidates who accept an offer may join within 1 hour, 1 week, or up to 45days of signing - though, we have a preference for as short a gap period between signing and joining since we're at the most exciting part of our journey - laying the foundation for the NowPurchase platform!

column2: Job description -    Executive Assistant We are looking for an individual, who has good analytical skills and who is willing to go extra mile to make things happen. In the role of Executive Assistant to CEO, the person will be involved in planning and executing strategic activities. The role will involve attending meetings along with or on behalf of CEO. In fact, the role will involve multi-tasking and require involvement in inter-departmental functions of the company.     Desired Candidate Profile The profile requires close working with the MD along with respective business heads in order to achieve strategic objectives. The profile requires multi-tasking, ability to conceptualize, implement new processes, create - update - follow up, attention to detail, working under stringent deadlines and aggregating and interpreting data. The profile provides exposure to diverse challenges facing the senior management. The ideal candidate should have abilities in business acumen; strategy formulation and P& L understanding; data comprehension & inference development; project management & team working. Roles and responsibility     Assist & coordinate the strategy planning exercise. Contribute to the overall development of company and its activities. To monitor tasks delegated by MD to ensure that the task is achieved to agreed deadlines. Co-ordinating Cross Functional teams to ensure project deliverable. External & Internal interface on behalf of MD. Helping in business presentations & tie up with internal & external stakeholders. Business data analysis. Assist the MD with inputs and data required for making strategic decisions. Set up meetings and appointments, organizing venues and hospitality for visitors etc. Ensure necessary records are maintained that can readily provide current, accurate and accessible information. Ensure statutory requirements are identified and met. Undertake mailings and communication as directed by the Managing Director. Contribute to the overall development of company and its activities. Ensure statutory requirements are identified and met. Personality Traits     Proficient in MS Office(ESP PowerPoint and Excel) A motivated self-starter with strong interpersonal skills & High On Integrity. Excellent Written, Oral Communication Skills and Analytical skills. Should have good sense of time management, planning & organizing, judgement and analysis Adaptability / comfort in coordination / interaction with internal and external customers

column2: Job Title: Industrial Relations Specialist Key Responsibilities: 1. Compliance Management: - Monitor and ensure adherence to all relevant labor laws, regulations, and statutory requirements. - Conduct regular audits to assess compliance levels and identify areas for improvement. - Develop and implement strategies to address compliance gaps and mitigate risks. 2. Provident Fund (PF) and Employee State Insurance (ESI)  includes Contractors and Workmen. - Administer PF and ESI schemes, including registration, contribution calculation, and timely deposit of contributions. - Liaise with regulatory authorities and ensure compliance with PF, ESI, and related regulations. - Manage audits of PF and ESI and resolve any discrepancies or issues that may arise. 3. Statutory Filings and Reporting: - Prepare and submit all required statutory filings, returns, and reports related to PF, ESI, and other labor laws. - Maintain accurate records and documentation to support compliance efforts and facilitate audits as needed. 4. Labour Law: - Stay updated on changes in labor laws and regulations and ensure company policies and practices align with legal requirements and implement when applicable. 5. Industrial Relations:  - Foster positive relations between the company and its employees through effective communication and grievance resolution. - Serve as a point of contact for employee concerns, grievances, and disputes, working towards timely resolution while maintaining fairness and equity. Qualifications: - Bachelor's degree in Law, Human Resources, Industrial Relations, or a related field. - Minimum 10 years of experience in industrial relations, labor law compliance, or a similar role. - Strong knowledge labor laws applicable to the industry. - Excellent communication, negotiation, and interpersonal skills. - Detail-oriented with strong analytical and problem-solving abilities.

The ideal candidate will be a masterful multitasker with exceptional communication skills and the ability to thrive in a fast-paced environment. As an Executive Assistant, you will play a crucial role in managing the day-to-day operations of our executives, ensuring smooth coordination, and providing administrative support. Screen and prioritize incoming communications, including emails, phone calls, and correspondence. Prepare and edit documents, presentations, and reports for executive review. Handle confidential information with discretion and maintain strict confidentiality at all times. Perform ad hoc tasks and special projects as assigned by executives. Proven experience as an Executive Assistant or similar role, preferably in a fast-paced corporate environment. Exceptional organizational and time management skills, with the ability to prioritize tasks effectively. Strong attention to detail and accuracy in all aspects of work.
